title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           13000 Highway 244 Building 31, Suite 1  Keystone, SD 57751                 Directions         Visitors traveling by car from the East use Exit 61 off I-90 follow signs. Coming from the West use exit 57 exit at Rapid City and follow U.S. Highway 16 southwest to Keystone and then Highway 244 to Mount Rushmore. Visitors coming from the south should follow Highway 385 north to Highway 244, which is the road leading to the memorial.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Mount Rushmore grounds Weather permitting, the grounds at Mount Rushmore are open every day of the year.  The Information Center, Visitor Center, Gift Shop and Carver's Café are open every day except December 25th.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM   Monday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM   Tuesday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM   Wednesday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM   Thursday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM   Friday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM   Saturday: 5:00 AM - 11:00 PM      Additional Information View More       Winter Hours - Mount Rushmore grounds:   October 1  - March 11   Sunday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM   Monday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM   Tuesday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM   Wednesday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM   Thursday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM   Friday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM   Saturday: 5:00 AM - 9:00 PM                  Weather           Weather at Mount Rushmore can be highly variable in any season.  Summer high temperatures range from 70 100 degrees Fahrenheit.  Fall high temperatures range from 45 to 80 degrees Fahrenheit.  Winter high temperatures range from 20 to 40 degrees Fahrenheit.  Spring high temperatures range from 30 to 70 degrees Fahrenheit.  July and August are the warmest months, December and January the coldest.  March and April receive the most snow, while May and June receive the most rain.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Mount Rushmore Entrance Fee - $0.00 There is no entrance fee for Mount Rushmore National Memorial. However, fees are required to park at the memorial.   Mount Rushmore Parking Fee - private vehicles - $11.00 Parking fee is for private passenger vehicles, valid for remainder of calendar year from date of purchase.  Annual Pass, Annual Pass - Military, Senior Pass, Access Pass and Every Kid In A Park Pass do not apply.   Mount Rushmore Parking Fee - Commercial Bus - $50.00 Valid for 24 hours from time of purchase.  Annual Pass, Annual Pass - Military, Senior Pass, Access Pass and Every Kid In A Park Pass do not apply.   Mount Rushmore Parking Fee - School Bus - $25.00 Valid for 24 hours from time of purchase.  Annual Pass, Annual Pass - Military, Senior Pass, Access Pass and Every Kid In A Park Pass do not apply.         Visitor Centers       Information Center Find basic information about the memorial as well as information about the local area.   Lincoln Borglum Visitor Center Park information, film, museum exhibits and a bookstore.               Use the links below to find out when the memorial is open, what the fees are and the current conditions.
